triples.name: OpenAI Codex
triples.relevance: The paper uses GPT-3 Codex as the foundation for automatically generating simulation models from natural language descriptions.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an NLP-based framework for automatic simulation model development from verbal descriptions.

triples.name: Simulation modeling
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a method for automatic generation of simulation models for logistics systems.

triples.name: Queueing theory
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates the ability to generate simulation models for queuing systems automatically.

triples.name: Inventory management
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates automatic generation of simulation models for inventory management systems.

triples.name: Human-AI interaction
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a framework for human-AI collaboration in the domain of simulation modelling.

triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: The paper leverages language models to automatically generate simulation code from natural language descriptions.
